name: Preemo
overview:
Preemo is Miami’s Hometown Computer Repair & Technology Solutions Company, specializing in pre-paid tech support for small businesses, start-ups, and private homes.

Preemo’s services are divided into three tiers: in-store computer repair, on-site repair & consulting, and our technology concierge. In-Store services encompass everything from the most basic of computer optimizations and hardware upgrades, to entire system breakdowns, virus & malware removal, motherboard and screen repair - all at a reasonable price, and guaranteed to work.

The second tier, dubbed TechTime, is mainly for small businesses, but also available to residential clients. It consists of on-site repair, maintenance, and tech support in a pre-paid, pay-as-you-go plan. With TechTime, clients buy blocks of time with a Preemo technology specialists for a set cost thatâ€™s lower than the standard rate. When services are needed, time is deducted directly from the TechTime account. As the balance runs low, clients are offered additional blocks of time at a low flat rate. This system offers a simple and easy way to track technology costs, providing a predicable purchasing plan that clients can monitor themselves. Hours are valid for 12 months, and transferable, so they can be used between home and office, as well as an offer for prospective clients, friends, and employees.

Finally, the technology concierge service is specific to high-end clients, including athlete, celebrities, and high net worth individuals. It offers a turnkey technology solutions platform, including setup, maintenance, repair, training, and consulting, all provided by a technology specialists, handling every aspect, including purchasing and setup.

Overall - Preemo delivers a unique customer experience that ensures repeat business and creates loyal, satisfied customers. We simplify technology to allow clients to lever it better, and to be more effective in their use.
